mapper.select: SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, r.name, r.content, r.price, r.max_guests AS maxGuests, r.bedrooms, r.beds, r.bathrooms, r.building_type AS buildingType, r.use_guide AS useGuide, r.latitude, r.longitude, r.is_active AS isActive FROM rooms r WHERE r.room_id = #{roomId}
SELECT c.name FROM categories c JOIN rooms_categories rc ON c.category_id = rc.category_id WHERE rc.room_id = #{roomId}
SELECT o.name FROM room_options o JOIN rooms_room_options ro ON o.option_id = ro.option_id WHERE ro.room_id = #{roomId}
SELECT file_url FROM image_files WHERE entity_type = 'rooms' AND entity_id = #{roomId}
SELECT is_active FROM rooms WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
SELECT user_id FROM rooms WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
